# paragraphStyle

**Type Property**

The paragraph style of the text.

## Declaration

```swift
static let paragraphStyle: NSAttributedString.Key
```

## Discussion

The value of this attribute is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSParagraphStyle] object. Use this attribute to apply multiple attributes to a range of text. If you do not specify this attribute, the string uses the default paragraph attributes, as returned by the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSParagraphStyle/default] method of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSParagraphStyle].

## Getting rendering attribute keys

- **backgroundColor**: The color of the background behind the text.
- **baselineOffset**: The vertical offset for the position of the text.
- **font**: The font of the text.
- **foregroundColor**: The color of the text.
- **glyphInfo**: The name of a glyph info object.
- **kern**: The kerning of the text.
- **ligature**: The ligature of the text.
- **strikethroughColor**: The color of the strikethrough.
- **strikethroughStyle**: The strikethrough style of the text.
- **strokeColor**: The color of the stroke.
- **strokeWidth**: The width of the stroke.
- **superscript**: The superscript of the text.
- **tracking**: The amount to modify the default tracking.
- **underlineColor**: The color of the underline.
- **underlineStyle**: The underline style of the text.
